text: Barbara Jo Revelle (1946) is an American artist known for her public murals and photography. Among Revelle's works is A Colorado Panorama: A People’s History, a 200-foot long porcelain tile mural installed along the side of the Denver Convention Center. ==Collections== *Seattle Art Museum *Los Angeles Museum of Contemporary Art *Museum of Contemporary Photography *Center for Creative Photography *Portland Art Museum *Oakland Museum of Contemporary Art ==References== Category:1946 births Category:20th-century American women artists Category:21st-century American women artists Category:Living people
